title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\JobTrigger
name: JobTrigger
description:
Contains a configuration to make dlp api calls on a repeating basis.

See https://cloud.google.com/dlp/docs/concepts-job-triggers to learn more.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.JobTrigger

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Unique resource name for the triggeredJob, assigned by the service when the triggeredJob is created, for example projects/dlp-test-project/jobTriggers/53234423.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Display name (max 100 chars)

params.name: data.description
params.description: User provided description (max 256 chars)

params.name: data.inspect_job
params.description: For inspect jobs, a snapshot of the configuration.

params.name: data.triggers
params.description: A list of triggers which will be OR'ed together. Only one in the list needs to trigger for a job to be started. The list may contain only a single Schedule trigger and must have at least one object.

params.name: data.errors
params.description: Output only. A stream of errors encountered when the trigger was activated. Repeated errors may result in the JobTrigger automatically being paused. Will return the last 100 errors. Whenever the JobTrigger is modified this list will be cleared.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The creation timestamp of a triggeredJob.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The last update timestamp of a triggeredJob.

params.name: data.last_run_time
params.description: Output only. The timestamp of the last time this trigger executed.

params.name: data.status
params.description: Required. A status for this trigger.

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description:
Output only. A stream of errors encountered when the trigger was activated. Repeated errors may result in the JobTrigger automatically being paused.

Will return the last 100 errors. Whenever the JobTrigger is modified this list will be cleared.
